text: Which of the following statements is/are true? (a) If L* is regular then L is regular. (b) It is decidable whether given a TM M and an input x and M enters some state more than 100 times. (c) Every recursively enumerable language can be accepted by a TM whose head only moves to the right. (d) The following problem is decidable: Given a TM M and a string w, does M accept w within |w| steps?
